metadata.title: CVE-2024-4693 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the QEMU Virtio PCI Bindings (hw/virtio/virtio-pci.c).An improper release and use of the irqfd for vector 0 during the bootprocess leads to a guest triggerable crash via vhost_net_stop(). This flawallows a malicious guest to crash the QEMU process on the host.

criterions.comment: qemu package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
